memberdef.name: closest_point_ISO

detaileddescription.para: Compute the point on clothoid at minimal distance from a given point using the optimized algorithm described in the publication:

listitem.para: E.Bertolazzi, M.Frego, Point-Clothoid distance and projection computation SIAM J. Scientific Computing, Vol. 41, No. 5, pp. A3326-A3353

parameterdescription.para: x-coordinate of the point on clothoid at minimal distance
y-coordinate of the point on clothoid at minimal distance
curvilinear coordinate of the point (X,Y) on the clothoid
normal coordinate of the point (X,Y) on the clothoid
the distance of the point from the clothoid

simplesect.para: 1 = point is projected orthogonal 0 = more than one projection (first returned) -1 = minimum point is not othogonal projection to curve

memberdef.argsstring: (real_type qx, real_type qy, real_type offs, real_type &x, real_type &y, real_type &s, real_type &t, real_type &dst) const override
memberdef.name: closest_point_ISO

detaileddescription.para: Given a point find closest point on the curve.

parameterdescription.para: x-coordinate of the projected point on the curve
y-coordinate of the projected point on the curve
parameter on the curve of the projection
curvilinear coordinate of the point x,y (if orthogonal projection)

simplesect.para: 1 = point is projected orthogonal 0 = more than one projection (first returned) -1 = minimum point is not othogonal projection to curve

Class to manage Clothoid Curve. A clothoid curve is described by the following generalized Fresnel integrals
